name: Nxpperf_csvcheckbw_testlist
purpose: Nxp performances tests accessible with runsim -f $WORK_TOP/dv/full_sys/tb/runsim_nxpperf_csvcheckbw_testlist.json -l regr
_comment: BY DEFAULT: check the bw for each agents with the file $WORK_TOP/dv/full_sys/<plusargs:bw_ref_file_name>
_comment1: add -so "dump_bw_results_csv=1" to dump a file in $WORK_TOP/bw_results.csv which can be used a ref csv

fsys._comment_version_0.1: merge nxpcase,pcie,qos runtestlist and use flavors to run rd,wr or rw with 0ns,100ns,200ns

hw_config_nxpauto.purpose: Nxp test case:1CHI (96 OTT) datawidth 256 & 4 IO(32OTT) + 1 IO(16 OTT) Freq1.3Ghz datawidth 128 // all IOs ACE-LITE-E(with stash), 2 DCE 10 way 2K sets for snoopfilter ,1 DMI SMC size 1MB: 1K sets of 16 ways, 4 data banks & 2 tag banks, 64 RTT & 32 WTT DMI datawidth 256 // 2DII  1.3Ghz
label: regr
std
write
dii
dbg
one

caiu0_seq_test1.name: concerto_fullsys_qos_test
caiu0_seq_test1.purpose: seq duty cycle on 1000 consecutive addresses / dutycycle:5=WRRRRR)
label: use_flavors_label

caiu0_seq_test_noncoh.name: concerto_fullsys_qos_test
caiu0_seq_test_noncoh.purpose: seq NON COHERENT duty cycle on 1000 consecutive addresses / dutycycle:5=WRRRR / out of order (NO ORDER)
label: use_flavors_label

caiu0_seq_test1_10pctmiss.name: concerto_fullsys_qos_test
caiu0_seq_test1_10pctmiss.purpose: seq duty cycle on 1000 consecutive addresses / ReadOnce dutycycle:5=WRRRR / out of order (NO ORDER)// use use_loop_addr_xx to create 10% of miss & remove first loop(doff) to calculate the BW
label: use_flavors_label

caiu0_seq_cache.purpose: seq  loop on 200 consecutive addresses / ReadOnce only // remove 200 first txn to fill the cache
label: use_flavors_label
